Event.name: Taking
Event.definition:
<def-root>An <fen>Agent</fen> removes a <fen>Theme</fen> from a <fen>Source</fen> so that the it is in the <fen>Agent</fen>'s possession.
<ex><fex name="Agent">Milton</fex> <t>took</t> <fex name="Theme">the can of beer</fex> <fex name="Source">out of the refrigerator</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Agent
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The person who takes possession of the <fen>Theme</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Agent">Milton</fex> <t>took</t> the can of beer out of the refrigerator.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Theme
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Agent</fen> takes possession of the <fen>Theme</fen>. <ex>Milton <t>took</t> <fex name="Theme">the can of beer</fex> out of the refrigerator.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Source
Arg.definition: <def-root>The location of the <fen>Theme</fen> prior to the taking. <ex>Milton <t>took</t> the can of beer <fex name="Source">out of the refrigerator</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Place
Arg.definition: <def-root>Where the taking takes place. <ex>Police <t>seized</t> several tons of marijuana <fex name="Place">in Berkeley</fex> last weekend.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Time
Arg.definition: <def-root>When the taking takes place. <ex>The government <t>seizure</t> of a suspected dissident's computer <fex name="Time">last November</fex> has increased the tension between citizens and law enforcement.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Manner
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Manner</fen> of the taking. <ex>Milton <fex name="Mnr">stealthily</fex> <t>took</t> the can of beer out of the refrigerator.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Means
Arg.definition: <def-root>The intermediate action taken by the <fen>Agent</fen> to take the <fen>Theme</fen>. <ex>Milton <t>took</t> the can of beer from John <fex name="Mns">by distracting him with a shiny nickel</fex></ex>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Purpose
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Purpose</fen> for the taking. <ex>Milton <t>took</t> the can of beer out of the refrigerator <fex name="Pur">to make sure no one else took it</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Explanation
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Explanation</fen> for the taking. <ex>Milton <t>took</t> the champagne out of the ice <fex name="exp">because it was getting too cold</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Containing_event
Arg.definition: <def-root>The larger event which contains the Taking event. <ex>These weapons were <t>seized</t> <fex name="CE">in a police raid</fex></ex>.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: take.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: to act so as to acquire

lexUnit.name: seize.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: to take by force, esp. despite the resistance of the current possessor or contrary to law

lexUnit.name: grab.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: take something from a source

lexUnit.name: commandeer.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: to take possession of something for one's own use, without the authority to do so
